API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.extrusion.data.Curve3D

type
class
subclasses
sandy.extrusion.data.Lathe
version
3.1
Specifies a curve in 3D space.

Constructor

new()
Creates empty Curve3D object.

Instance Variables

b(getB,setB) : Array<sandy.core.data.Point3D>

Array of binormal unit Point3Ds at curve points. Set to null in order to re-calculate it from t and n.

n : Array<sandy.core.data.Point3D>

Array of normal unit Point3Ds at curve points.

s : Array<Float>

Array of scalar values at curve points. toSections method uses these values to scale crossections.

t : Array<sandy.core.data.Point3D>

Array of tangent unit Point3Ds at curve points.

toSections(default,method) : ?stabilize : Bool -> Array<sandy.core.data.Matrix4>

Computes matrices to use this curve as extrusion path.

v : Array<sandy.core.data.Point3D>

Array of points that curve passes through.
